dmca.title: Matrimony Site CEO Complains Webpages Copied (#3)
dmca.body:
Confidential	Page 1	12/29/03

Sender Information:
[Private] 
Shaadi.com, 
[Private], 
[Private], 
Worll, Mumbei .400018. 
INDIA.

Recipient Information-,
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
Google Inc.
[Private]Mountain View, CA 94G43

Sent via: Fax
Re. Infringement Notification

Infringement Notification (http://www.chillingeffects.org/dmca5l2/#FAQID4634)

Monday. December 29, 2003

Dear Google Team,

Following is the form you requested regarding our allegations of stolen copyrighted material by: http://www.shubhshaadi.com

We hope you are able to handle this disregard for the work I have paid for quickly and without trouble.

1 The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on

http://www.shaadi.com/weddingplanning/planner.php
http://www.shaadi.com/weddingplanning/planner-thingstodo.php
http://www.shaadi.com/weddingplanning/planner-moneymatters.php

http://www.shaadi.com/marriage-rituals-customs/wedding-catholic.php http://www.shaadi.com/marriage-rituals-customs/wedding-guiarati.php 
http://www.shaadi.com/marriage-rituals-customs/wedding-kannada.php

http://www.shaadi.com/marriage-rituals-customs/wedding-sindhi.php
http://www.shaadi.com/marriage-rituals-customs/wedding-tamilian.php.
http://www.shaadi.com/marriage-rituals-customs/wedding-telugu.php

Content of the web page, has been simply cut and pasted onto and copied by the following wabsite: http://www.shubhshaadi.com/

2. Search Query: shaadi wedding planner
Infringing web page: http://www.shubhshaadi.com/weddingplanner.htm

Infringing web page: http://www.shubhshaadi.com/ttodo.htm

3. Our contact info: [Private]

4. The infringing site has listed: [Private] as the contact email address.

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing Web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. "I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

7. Thank you for your concern with this matter.

[Private]

Founder/ CEO Shaadi.com
[Private]
Date: December 29. 2003
